stories.text:
There is so much good content on HackerNews. Too much sometimes. I often just click on articles, realize it's very long, go back to HackerNews, and never really read anything!

Introducing MakeTime! When you come across an artcile worth reading, use MakeTime to help you schedule a time dedicated towards reading that article.

I built MakeTime for myself and I've been getting so much more value out of being on the internet. Hope you enjoy!
stories.title: Show HN: MakeTime – A simple tool to help you schedule reading time
Ng Mui – The Nun Who Invented Wing Chun (2020)

stories.text: Is it only me that noticed errors in AWS billing? Now I don’t want to be super suspicious but searching the internet gives almost nothing, searching HN same nothing, and a comment about this same topic a few hours ago was marked [flagged] minutes after publishing… any thoughts by the community of Cloud Services users here?
stories.title: AWS billing error: is it only me?
